mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`order_id` as 'orderId', a.`order_no` as 'orderNo', a.`order_time` as 'orderTime', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`return_shipping_method` as 'returnShippingMethod', a.`memo` as 'memo', a.`ship_name` as 'shipName', a.`ship_address` as 'shipAddress', a.`return_shop_id` as 'returnShopId', a.`customer_id` as 'customerId',
from `t_order_return_request` as a
